name: Ninja Star Quest for the Cursed Swords (mcolverdesigns)
name_original: Ninja Star Quest for the Cursed Swords (mcolverdesigns)
description: Play Yasuhisa Shiozaki, a warrior trying to change his fate for the better. He must embark on a quest, to restore three curse swords back to their shrines,  to bring piece to the land, it's people, and restore honor to his family.
